title: Persona / Archetype Example
description: A neutralized version of Eplanet Thunderstriker as a civic catalyst persona, demonstrating how individuals can inspire node activity and cross-node coordination.

title: Syntheverse Culture Mapping
description: Tracking how music, film, AI, and digital culture flow into civic signals. Participants can map trends and patterns as part of their node contributions.

title: Outside-the-Box Scenarios
description: Exercises exploring unconventional civic coordination: What if cities coordinated cross-border? What if universities logged governance failures as nodes? What if cultural symbols were mirrored for civic awareness?

title: Speculative Futures
description: Imagining alternative civic patterns, interventions, or federations without central authority. Encourages participants to explore potential solutions creatively.

title: Civic Innovation Labs
description: Nodes can experiment with new submission formats, media types, or AI-assisted observations. Focused on expanding participation modes and inter-node resonance.
